title: Johnny Depp’s Uphill Battle EXPLAINED by Half-Asian Lawyer Bill Richmond
description:
In a very special "Ash Wednesday," Half-Asian Lawyer Bill Richmond makes his return to the show. We discuss what Elon Musk's most important moves will be now that he owns Twitter. And of course, since he's a lawyer, we talked about the Johnny Depp vs. Amber Heard trial. #JohnnyDepp #AmberHeard #ElonMusk
